name: Fading Existence
description:
Fading Existence is a text adventure where you play as a captain of a spaceship trying to find a new home, since planet earth does not exist any longer. Your journey is fully randomly generated, no game will be the same as the last one.

This game is my entry for the Minimalistic Jam 2.

Features:

  • over 700 planets with an infinite amount of looks, atmospheres, remains of forgotten civilizations and so on.
  • A lot of event happening during your mission, randomly generated.
  • Graphics limited to 2 colors per sprite and 10 in total
  • unknown species with own languages
  • some epic bit music

Controls:
Arrow keys and return or via the mouse
F11 to enable fullscreen
All planet stats are given in percent, the more percent the better.
If you feel confused because of the high amount of ship stats, simple ignore them at first and see what influence they have.
